import React,{useState} from 'react'; import {Card,Button,Row,Col,Modal} from "react-bootstrap" const Pizza=({pizza}) => { const [varient,setVarient]=useState('small'); const[quantity,setQuantity]=useState(1); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); return ( <>
{pizza.name}
variants
Quantity
 Price:{pizza.prices[0][varient]*quantity} /Rs Modal heading Woohoo, you're reading this text in a modal! ); }; export default Pizza;
